summary: STEERING LOST RESPONSE TO WHEELS,   AFTER CORRECTION,    STEERING WILL NOT COME BACK TO CENTER'   CAR WANDERS FROM SIDE TO SIDE    YOU MUST KEEP BOTH HANDS ON THE STEERING WHEEL AT ALL TIMES,    PROBLEM HAS HAPPENED BEFORE..
